attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the interests of all UK citizens why can you not fund your own pension by buying into your own future by investing in your own property and/or assets.

Your individual pensionable salary in market assets is undeniably in question in torrid times. Surely it would make more sense to allow the individual to have relief on their own assets. Once say the individual has acquired there property or assets then there future may not be so bleak.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
